mapper.select: SELECT ntc.* ,cod.code_label AS noticeKindTitle ,fle.file_url FROM tb_notice ntc LEFT JOIN tb_code cod ON cod.p_code = 'NOTICE_KIND' and cod.code = ntc.notice_kind LEFT JOIN tb_file fle ON fle.link_info = 'noticeMainImage' and fle.link_key = ntc.notice_id WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_notice SET use_fg = 0 WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
